name: Brain Fingerprinting Laboratories
overview:
Brain Fingerprinting Laboratories, Inc. (BFL) works to further research on Brain Wave science, (described below), and to make this information more accessible for the criminal justice sector.

BFL has developed and patented EEG/P300 based testing systems that determine with accuracy whether or not specific information is stored in a personâ€™s memory. The test measures individual brain-wave responses to relevant words, pictures or sounds presented by a computer. The measurements are recorded in fractions of a second after the stimulus is presented, before the subject is able to formulate or control a response. In a major milestone for the company, the results of this patented testing methodology have been ruled admissible in court as scientific evidence.

Brain Fingerprinting Laboratories was named one of the top five American security startups, as determined by the Global Security Challenge.
